name: SecKeySizes
desc: The supported sizes for keys of various common types.

items.name: case secDefaultKeySize
items.desc: The default key size for the specified type.

items.name: static var secp192r1: SecKeySizes
items.desc: 192-bit ECC Keys for Suite-B from RFC 4492 section 5.1.1.

items.name: static var secp256r1: SecKeySizes
items.desc: 256-bit ECC Keys for Suite-B from RFC 4492 section 5.1.1.

items.name: case secp384r1
items.desc: 384-bit ECC Keys for Suite-B from RFC 4492 section 5.1.1.

items.name: case secp521r1
items.desc: 521-bit ECC Keys for Suite-B from RFC 4492 section 5.1.1.

items.name: case secRSAMin
items.desc: 1024 bits is the minimum size for an RSA key.

items.name: case secRSAMax
items.desc: 4096 bits is the maximum size for an RSA key.
